tooltip: Select Link, Heir of King Gustaf, as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Link focuses on training and improving Knights.
Allows you to summon Link, a sword and shield hero armed with powerful abilities.
Link can train Champion Knights, powerful leader units that reduce the fear of your soldiers.
Knight units train 25% faster and and immune to fear.
Link can upgrade Knights with the Hylian Shield.
